doc:
Harpo Marx https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Harpo_Marx 0 Arthur "Harpo" Marx (born Adolph Marx; November 23, 1888 – September 28, 1964) was an American comedian, actor, mime artist, and musician, and the second-oldest of the Marx Brothers. In contrast to the mainly verbal comedy of his brothers Groucho Marx and Chico Marx, Harpo's comic style was visual, being an example of both clown and pantomime traditions. He wore a curly reddish blonde wig, and never spoke during performances (he blew a horn or whistled to communicate). He frequently used props such as a horn cane, made up of a lead pipe, tape, and a bulbhorn, and he played the harp in most of his films. Arthur_"_Harpo_"_Marx ( born Adolph_Marx ; November_23_,_1888 – September_28_,_1964 ) was an_American_comedian , actor , mime_artist , and musician , and the_second-oldest of the_Marx_Brothers . In contrast to the_mainly_verbal_comedy of his_brothers_Groucho_Marx and Chico_Marx , Harpo 's_comic_style was visual , being an_example of both_clown_and_pantomime_traditions . He wore a_curly_reddish_blonde_wig , and never_spoke during performances ( he blew a_horn or whistled_to_communicate ) . He frequently used props such_as a_horn_cane , made up of a_lead_pipe , tape , and a_bulbhorn , and he played the_harp in most of his_films .
